VII.i.4.A.1.e
.
Forms Claimants Must Use to Apply for Benefits
Effective March 24, 2015, a claimant must submit the prescribed form from among those listed in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.A
, to claim entitlement to
additional disability compensation for a dependent parent, or
DIC as the parent of a Veteran.
Notes
:
If a claimant requests one of the benefits referenced in the bullets above but fails to submit with it the prescribed form, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 2.G.1
.
Forms a claimant submits to VA must be complete and include the claimant’s signature.
If a form does
not
include the claimant’s signature, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.A.4.e
.
If a form is incomplete, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C
.
Reference
:  For more information on adding a dependent to a beneficiary’s award, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.C
.
